Description: To verify that channel user's SOS request is not processed for network wallet if channel user is not allowed as receiver as per user life cycle.
To verify that channel user cannot hit SOS request through EXTGW with SOS wallet as network if SOS is not allowed for the user.
To verify that channel user's SOS request is not processed if operator does not have sufficient network stock.
To verify that channel user's SOS request is not processed for network wallet if channel user's previous SOS request is pending for settlement.
To verify that channel user's SOS request is not processed if invalid product code is entered in the request.
To verify that channel user's SOS request is not processed if invalid PIN is entered in the request.
To verify that channel user's SOS request is not processed if  product code is not entered in the request.
To verify that channel user's SOS request is not processed if  MSISDN is not entered in the request.
To verify that channel user's SOS request is not processed if  PIN is not entered in the request.
To verify that channel user's SOS request is not processed if invalid language code is entered in the request.
To verify that channel user cannot hit SOS request through EXTGW with SOS wallet as network if user's balance is more than SOS threshold amount.
